src:
Feriha v pokročilom štádiu tehotenstva: Vieme, koľko kíl pribrala
Obľúbená herečka sa ani krátko pred pôrodom neskrýva.
04 Nov 2019, 16:00 by jt
Už to má za pár! Už tento mesiac sa 29-ročná turecká herečka Hazal Kaya, alias nezabudnuteľná Feriha z rovnomenného seriálu či Nihal zo Zakázanej lásky, má stať mamou.
Svojmu manželovi, o 15 rokov staršiemu režisérovi Alimu Atayovi, za ktorého sa vydala vo februári tohto roku, privedie na svet synčeka, pre ktorého už majú vybraté meno Fikret Ali.
Herečka sa ani v pokročilom štádiu tehotenstva neskrýva a pravidelne sa objavuje na spoločenských udalostiach, či v uliciach Istanbulu. Hazal podľa tureckých médií počas tehotenstva nabrala 18 kilogramov. Toto je jej aktuálny výzor.



Zdroj: Instagram/ennmagazinn
text:
Feriha in the advanced stage of pregnancy: We know how many pounds she gained
Favorite actress is not hiding shortly before giving birth.
04 Nov 2019, 15:00 by jt
He's got it in a couple! Already this month, 29-year-old Turkish actress Hazal Kaya, alias the unforgettable Feriha of the same episode or Nihal of the Forbidden Love, is to become a mother.
Her husband, 15 years older director Ali Atay, whom she married in February this year, will bring a baby son, for whom they have chosen the name Fikret Ali.
Even at an advanced stage of pregnancy, the actress does not hide and regularly appears on social events or on the streets of Istanbul. According to Turkish media, Hazal gained 18 kilograms during pregnancy. This is her current look.



Source: Instagram / ennmagazinn
